div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Welcome to Shasta Elementary! Click here to take a tour of our campus.We have a great campus located just west of Redding off of 299 at 10446 Red Bluff Rd. Shasta, CA 96087. We are proud to offer a free Montessori public program servicing familes from Preschool through 8th Grade. Take a look around at our online tour

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-15928 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: Shasta‌ ‌Elementary‌ ‌School‌ ‌ Distance‌ ‌Learning‌ ‌Packets‌ ‌ Distribution‌ ‌and‌ ‌Collection‌ ‌Schedule‌ ‌ April‌ ‌14-June‌ ‌5,‌ ‌2020‌ ‌ ‌ Due‌ ‌to‌ ‌restrictions‌ ‌related‌ ‌to‌ ‌COVID-19,‌ ‌Shasta‌ ‌Elementary‌ ‌School‌ ‌is‌ ‌moving‌ ‌to‌ ‌a‌ ‌Distance‌ ‌...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-15925 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: Dear Shasta Elementary School Families, I hope this letter finds you well. We are currently experiencing an unprecedented event due to the state, national, and global pandemic. When we started our closure, it was our plan to restart school after spring break. That...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-5087 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: In an effort to streamline information for our families please visit this link for any updates regarding the COVID-19 closure - http://reddingschools.net/covid-19-information This will be the only place we continue to post district wide information regarding the...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-5078 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-miner-news

div.p: Dear Shasta School Families, I begin with a sincere thank you for all of our community diligence and support throughout the last few weeks as we have worked together to navigate this challenging landscape. I am writing today with updated information on new steps that...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-5069 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

img.alt: Practicing Good Health in School and at Home

h2.a: Practicing Good Health in School and at Home

div.p: As news reports continue to focus on the coronavirus, we want to assure our community members that the safety of students, staff, and families is a priority for us, and we are continuing our health related practices at the schools. Our custodians will continue their...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-5065 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: The United States Census 2020 begins soon. Participation in the census is important because it helps to decide how much federal money our schools will get over the next ten years, an how much money our state will get for our parks, neighborhood improvements, public...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-5061 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

img.alt: Congratulations Spelling Bee Participants and Winners

h2.a: Congratulations Spelling Bee Participants and Winners

div.p: Congratulations to all the students who participated in our school Spelling Bees on Tuesday, February 25th. All competitors did a fantastic job demonstrating confidence and good sportsmanship. We are proud of you! Winners of our 2nd-3rd Grade Spelling Bee are: First...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-4829 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: The School Site Council is a group of parents, teachers, and community members who develop the School Plan for Student Achievement, provide oversight for our federally funded programs, and give input regarding other important schools decisions. Our next meeting is...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-3581 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: The current School Accountability Report Card for Shasta has been uploaded and can be accessed here: http:// About the SARC By February 1 of each year, every school in California is required by state law to publish a School Accountability...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-4423 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-miner-news

div.p: Please join us for Kindergarten Round Up on Tuesday, April 28th, from 9:00 - 10:30 a.m. This is a great opportunity to tour our campus, check out our classrooms, learn more about our programs, and begin the kindergarten registration process. See the attached flyer...

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1 et_clickable et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Quick Tip allows you to submit an anonymous tip to school and district officials.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: During the COVID-19 shutdown many of our families are using technology to connect with their teachers. The RSD Technology Team is available by submitting a ticket to help answer basic questions.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Forms for enrolling your child.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_4 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: The Dashboard contains reports that display the performance of local educational agencies (LEAs), schools, and student groups on a set of state and local measures to assist in identifying strengths, weaknesses, and areas in need of improvement.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_5 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Our new Parent and Student Aeries.NET link. Please visit to setup your account or login and view your grades, attendance and more.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_6 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Renaissance Home Connect improves the school-to-home connection by allowing parents and students to log in to a website and view the student’s reading and math practice and progress towards goals. For more information please see this page What is Home Connect?

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_7 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Foundational Reading skills instruction for grades pre -K-5.

div.br:

Address
10446 Red Bluff Rd. Shasta, CA 96087

Grades 4-8 8:20am – 2:30pm
